title: Working mom of three: ‘Every day just seems impossible’
description: NBC News reporter Brandy Zadrozny, a mother of three, says back-to-school planning has “gone out the window” as state and local guidelines continue to shift.
source.name: MSNBC

title: San Antonio mayor: ‘We’ve got to put politics aside’ and focus on clear messaging
description: San Antonio Mayor Ron Nirenberg finds it “ridiculous” that Texas Lieutenant Gov. Dan Patrick and other politicians are disparaging the country’s top public health experts.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Colorado Secretary of State: Voter fraud is 'very hard to pull off,' but voter suppression is easy
description: Colorado Secretary of State Jena Griswold says we can’t allow Trump to use the pandemic as a tool for voter suppression.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Rep. Gwen Moore: 'Republicans are in denial about this virus’
description: Democratic Rep. Gwen Moore of Wisconsin, a member of the Congressional Black Caucus, says the GOP is risking Americans’ health and safety for “the economic outcomes Trump desires.”
source.name: MSNBC

title: War-torn Yemen struggles to contain the virus
description: NBC News' Keir Simmons reports on how Yemen is struggling to survive the coronavirus and a civil war.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Doctor on COVID-19: Don’t choose BBQ and beer over your life
description: Coronavirus cases could spike through large, public gatherings this July 4th weekend, as Dr. Corey Hébert expresses his alarm that so many Americans are not wearing masks and social distancing while still in phase one of the COVID-19 outbreak.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Shocking viral videos spark debates on race in America
description: Black Lives Matter and George Floyd protests have coincided with an apparent rise in viral racist incidents captured on video. Tiffany Cross in for Joy Reid and her panel discuss these shocking viral videos sparking debates on the state of race relations in A…
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Florida coronavirus cases hit 200K as state adds over 40K cases in just four days
description: NBC News’ Sam Brock reports from Miami Beach on Florida’s addition of over 10,000 new coronavirus cases, making the state the third highest count in the U.S. after New York and California.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Pundits say race, gender are center state in 2020 press coverage
description: Donald Trump made many statements during the 2016 presidential election cycle, which critics decried as racist and sexist, but which tended not to be explicitly called such by much of the media. Tiffany Cross in for Joy Reid and her panel discuss race and gen…
source.name: MSNBC

title: Is Kanye West 2020 a real thing? Pop start tweets his late entry
description: Donald Trump apparently had a supporter in Kanye West in the past, but on Saturday, July 4th, the pop star tweeted that he’s running for president in the 2020 election.
source.name: MSNBC

title: Commissioner on DeSantis: We’re in serious trouble in Florida
description: Florida recently hit 11,458 new coronavirus cases in a daily record for the state. Florida Commissioner of Agriculture and Consumer Services Nikki Fried tells Tiffany Cross in for Joy Reid that under the leadership of Republican Governor Ron DeSantis and
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Officials search for multiple suspects in fatal S.C., nightclub shooting
description: Officials are searching for multiple suspects in a Greenville, S.C., nightclub shooting. The event was partially violating the state's coronavirus restrictions since venues across S.C., are closed due to the virus. More than eight people were injured and two …
source.name: MSNBC

title: Florida pollster says 2020 vote will be a ‘referendum on Trump’
description: Florida is a battleground state in the 2020 election in which Donald Trump faces off against Joe Biden in a ‘referendum’ on his performance as president, pollster and political strategist Fernand R. Amandi asserts to Tiffany Cross in for Joy Reid.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump campaign ‘encourages’ masks at next rally
description: President Trump will provide masks at his next rally in Portsmouth, N.H. This is a change from his past rallies where he did not encourage wearing a mask amid the coronavirus pandemic.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Who Won the Week? Weigh in on the week's top stories
description: Jada Pinkett Smith, the black wealth gap, Alexis Olympia Ohanian, Jr., and more are discussed on AM JOY on MSNBC as Tiffany Cross in for Joy Reid and her panel debate: Who Won the Week?
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: Glaude: 'We have to build a country that’s just'
description: On this Independence Day weekend Kasie Hunt discusses the deepening of a divided America and its foundations with the framers of the Constitution themselves with Jon Meacham and Eddie Glaude Jr.
source.name: MSNBC
